thread.title: Fall is a busy time for figure skaters
thread.title_full: Fall is a busy time for figure skaters

title: Fall is a busy time for figure skaters
text: Fall is a busy time for figure skaters Competition and testing Fall is a busy time for figure skaters 0 comments It’s been a fun and productive two months for Sun Valley Figure Skating Club members who competed in Utah’s Oktoberfest competition and also passed U.S. Figure Skating Association tests. Six SVFSC skaters spent plenty of time on the podium at the annual Oktoberfest hosted by the Cottonwood Heights Figure Skating Club. The Sun Valley skaters reached the podium 10 times—with three gold medals, three silvers, one bronze and three fourth-place results. Here are medal recipients are listed from highest to lowest competitive level, and by event type: Freeskate : 2—Emma Stuessi, Open Juvenile. 3—Katie Peters, Open Juvenile. Showcase Dramatic Entertainment: 2—Alex Stuessi, Open Juvenile. 4—Blake Letourneau, Open Juvenile. 4—Sheldon Gentling, Pre-Juvenile. Showcase Light Entertainment: 1—Blake Letourneau. 2—Alex Stuessi. 4—Isabella Bourret, Novice. Showcase Duets: 1—Alex Stuessi and Blake Letourneau. 16 skaters pass USFSA tests The SVFSC hosted two test sessions in August where skaters were evaluated by a panel of judges on their moves and on their freeskate, dance, and pairs skills. Sixteen different skaters passed 38 tests. They were: Moves in the Field : Pre-Preliminary—Alex Griffin, Annabel Jensen and Brielle Kiem. Preliminary—Agnes Kind and Annabel Viesturs. Pre-Juvenile—Valerie Ward. Intermediate—Murphy Kendall. Junior—Katie Peters. Freeskate : Pre-Preliminary—Jaysa Bozzuto and Valerie Ward. Preliminary—Jaysa Bozzuto. Juvenile—Grace Cleveland. Free Dance: Juvenile--Murphy Kendall: Juvenile and Valerie Ward. Pattern Dances (7 levels and 23 pattern dances)—Jaysa Bozzuto: Hickory Hoedown (bronze) and Ten Fox (bronze); Kenley Bozzuto: Dutch Waltz (Preliminary); Elizabeth Brown: Rhythm Blues (Preliminary); Grace Cleveland: Blues (Pre-Gold) and Killian (Pre-Gold); Ali Hunt: Dutch Waltz (Preliminary), Canasta Tango (Preliminary), Rhythm Blues (Preliminary), Swing Dance (Pre-Bronze), Cha Cha (Pre-Bronze) and Fiesta Tango (Pre-Bronze); Mikayla Rose: Solo Kilian (Pre-Gold), Solo Blues (Pre-Gold), Solo Paso Doble (Pre-Gold); Ella Ward: Dutch Waltz (Preliminary); and Valerie Ward: Cha Cha (Pre-Bronze). Pairs : Pre-Juvenile—Jaysa Bozzuto, Sheldon Gentling, Ali Hunt and Valerie Ward. Juvenile: Jaysa Bozzuto, Sheldon Gentling and Ali Hunt.
